summary: I'm a Full-stack developer with 3+ years of experience in web and backend development. I'm Good at making REST APIs, third party APIs & library integration and Business logic.

projects.title: Vrindavan Furniture
projects.description: Made a dynamic catalogue website for Vrindavan Furnitures in CodeIgniter with MySQL, Bootstrap, jQuery & HTML. Used Cloudinary to store images.

work: Worked on a Reservation & Hotel management app backend (RESTful APIs with NodeJS)
Built a dashboard for lunch-providers app with ReactJs
Built Firebase Authentication base app using Firebase APIs and NodeJs & MongoDB
Built Email templates in ERP (for mutual funds based firm) using Laravel
Integrated various payment gateway like stripe (gateway & payout), paytm, elavon (converge & fusebox), shift4, freedompay
Setup and maintained AWS EC2 instance for projects I worked on
Worked on third-party APIs like Spoonacular, Firebase, Infor & Agilysys (Room Reservation and Hotel management)
Built an ERP system for PCB manufaturing firms having various modules like BOM, Sales, Purchase, Invoice, Inventory, Users (Phalcon PHP and MySQL Database)
Simple HTML to PDF converting library for PHP
Made Cross-platform desktop app using ElectronJs

dream: My dream job/project would include working with new technologies and open environment.
My preferred locations for job is Vadodara, Pune, Banglore (For superb opportunity, I can negotiate).
